home.title: Balla Botond | Personal Website
home.description: Balla Botond - Developer & creator with a passion for thoughtfully constructed, timeless solutions. Explore my projects, connect on social media, and discover my work in development and innovation.
home.keywords: Balla Botond, Botond Balla, developer, trackit, software developer, web developer, personal website, portfolio, bllbtnd, programming, innovation, Hungary, tech, projects, GitHub, Boti, Balla Boti
home.bio: With a discerning approach to both work and leisure, I gravitate toward experiences and solutions that are thoughtfully constructed and timeless in their appeal. My projects reflect a respect for established methods, balanced with a drive for innovation and precision. I find inspiration in the mastery behind well-made things—whether it's the structure of a robust application, the layered notes of a rare scotch, or the interplay of light and shadow. For me, quality is never accidental; it's the result of intention, care, and an appreciation for the details that stand the test of time.

minecraft.title: Minecraft Server
minecraft.description: Private survival server for friends with custom plugins and a welcoming community, that started as test to check the capabilities of my newly bought "toy", but now quite a few people started playing on it. It runs on a Raspberry Pi 5 on a home network.

resume.title: Resume | Balla Botond
resume.subtitle: Professional Resume
resume.position: Computer Science Student, Software Developer & Entrepreneur

summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.text: A results-driven Computer Science student with a passion for transforming complex problems into elegant software solutions. I complement my academic foundations by actively seeking real-world projects, believing that hands-on experience is key to true mastery. I am motivated by the entire development lifecycle, from conceptualizing a feature to deploying a functional, high-quality product like a web application or an efficient algorithm. I am a lifelong learner, constantly exploring new technologies and frameworks to sharpen my problem-solving skills.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.current_desc1: Developing software solutions for various companies, including Suzuki, as a part-time developer while pursuing university studies.
experience.current_desc2: Contributing to production-grade software projects within a specialized development team.
experience.current_desc3: Successfully balancing professional development experience with academic responsibilities.
experience.intern_desc1: Completed an intensive 8-week internship program, contributing to software development projects for Suzuki and its partner companies.
experience.intern_desc2: Learned professional coding standards and team workflows in a small, specialized development environment.
experience.intern_desc3: Successfully applied academic knowledge to solve practical technical challenges using industry tools.
experience.wolt_desc1: Executed timely and accurate deliveries across the city in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.
experience.wolt_desc2: Mastered route optimization and time management to maximize efficiency and ensure high customer satisfaction.
experience.wolt_desc3: Developed strong problem-solving skills and resilience while working independently under pressure.
experience.hotel_desc1: Provided exceptional service to a diverse, international clientele in a high-volume 4-star hotel environment.
experience.hotel_desc2: Managed all aspects of food and beverage service, ensuring a seamless and positive guest experience.
experience.hotel_desc3: Enhanced cross-cultural communication skills and honed my ability to perform gracefully under pressure.

education.title: Education
education.university_desc1: Pursuing a comprehensive Computer Science degree with a curriculum focused on software engineering, data structures, and advanced algorithms.
education.university_desc2: Actively involved in practical coursework and projects that bridge theory with real-world application.
education.highschool_desc: Graduated with excellent results, establishing a strong foundation in mathematics and analytical thinking.
